Reviews.Title: Best feature phone yet
Reviews.Author: Mariaelayna Truitt
Reviews.Content: I originally purchased this phone waaaay back in 2012, replaced it with an LG. Had numerous problems with the LG and was excited to find this one for sale.

Reviews.Title: Get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: joe mama
Reviews.Content: I paid twenty and its worth 20 it turns off at random times also the back falls off without tape

Reviews.Title: purchased as gift
Reviews.Author: Dee
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my son and he had no trouble setting it up and using. He likes the features.

Reviews.Title: Replacement phone...
Reviews.Author: Brian M. Thomas
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone to replace a current phone taht is no longer with VERIZPN as a selection in the stores, or online.  I haven't activated the phone yet, but it seems like it will be okay.,  It is thinner than the SCH u620, My complaint with this phone (before using it) is that it did not come with an owners' manual)

ProductInfo.Features:
This product has been carefully audited and is certified to be 100% functional.
This offer includes the following accessories 1. Battery 2. Battery Cover (if applicable) 3. Wall Charger
Ready for activation on the Verizon network - ESN has been cleared for use.

ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Trance SCH-U490 Cell Phone (CDMA) For Verizon
